body:
https://www.riverbankcomputing.com/hg/sip/file/6.4.0

Newer versions are available on pypi and the build system was changed to use setuptools. In addition the module variant was removed. I think the modules where outsourced into individual packages, e.g. PyQt5.sip into [pyqt5-sip](https://pypi.org/project/PyQt5-sip/) but I made sure that the old packages incl. modules still work.

Tested installation (including `--test=root`) for versions 4.19.21, 5.5.0, 6.4.0
Also tested that `py-pyqt5` which depends on `py-sip module=PyQt5.sip` still builds correctly (concretizes to use `py-sip@4.19.21` as before)
title: py-sip: add 5.5.0 and 6.4.0
